slug.description: URL-friendly identifier (lowercase, hyphens instead of spaces)

excerpt.description: Brief summary displayed in article cards and SEO metadata

content.description: Full article content. Supports Markdown for formatting

featured_image.description: URL to the article's cover/featured image

source_url.description: Link to source material (YouTube video, X post, etc.)

published.description: Whether the article should be visible on the site

featured.description: Whether to highlight this article (shows in featured sections)

example_article.title: Investigating Local Communities: A Reporter's Journey
example_article.excerpt: An inside look at the process of documenting stories that matter in communities across America.
example_article.content:
Every community has a story, and every story has a voice waiting to be heard. As an independent journalist, I've made it my mission to find and amplify those voices.

## The Approach

Investigative journalism isn't just about uncovering scandalsâ€”it's about understanding the human experience behind the headlines. When I arrive in a new community, I start by listening.

## Building Trust

Trust is earned, not given. I spend time getting to know community members before pulling out a camera or notebook. This approach leads to more authentic storytelling.

## The Stories We Tell

From small towns to major cities, each location offers unique perspectives on the issues affecting our nation:

* Economic challenges
* Political divides
* Cultural shifts
* Environmental concerns

## What's Next

I'll continue traveling and reporting on the stories that matter. Follow along on my YouTube channel and X for real-time updates.
